attributes.action: remember his duty as the First Servant of the Crown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: However irksome it may be for some of those asked from time to time by the Sovereign to form a Government of the United Kingdom, it is incumbent upon them to remember that their duty is to serve the Sovereign, to advise the Sovereign and protect the Sovereign. The Prime Minister is urged to remember these constitutional realities should the Sovereign be approached in connection with the current inquest on the death of Diana, Princess of Wales.
